attributes.action: block any attempt to create an extra round of Premier League matches abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On Thursday the 7th of February the Premier League agreed to explore a proposal to extend the season to 39 games with the extra round of matches being played abroad. This is a decision that is based purely on financial reasoning and does not take into account the feelings of supporters. It only alienates the games fans even further.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
